description: A smart medical platform for booking and managing appointments.

login.title: Login
login.error_required: Please enter your email or phone and password
login.success_message: Login successful. We wish you a great experience.

image_size_error: Image size must be less than 5MB
image_type_error: Please select a valid image file
pending_account_message: Your account is under review by management. You will be notified when approved.
error_server_connection: Server connection error - Make sure server is running on port 5000
confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
confirm_delete_doctor: Are you sure you want to delete this doctor?
confirm_delete_health_center: Are you sure you want to delete this health center?
confirm_approve_doctor: Are you sure you want to approve this doctor?
confirm_reject_doctor: Are you sure you want to reject this doctor?
confirm_add_featured_doctor: Are you sure you want to add this doctor to featured?
confirm_remove_featured_doctor: Are you sure you want to remove this doctor from featured?
notification_new_appointment: A new appointment was booked by {{name}} on {{date}} at {{time}}
notification_special_appointment: A special appointment has been booked for you with Dr. {{doctor}} on {{date}} at {{time}}
map_location_help: Add Google Maps link for clinic location or leave empty
map_location_error: Please enter a valid map location link
appointment_note: Please ensure your personal information is correct before booking. If you are booking an appointment for someone else, make sure to enter their correct name and phone number in your profile page.
profile_update_note: You can update your personal information from your profile page at any time
login_required: Please login first to access this page.

hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: Book your appointment with the best doctors in Iraq easily and safely

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about TabibiQ platform and how we help you in your health journey
about.description: TabibiQ is a leading medical platform in Iraq, aiming to facilitate communication between patients, doctors, and medical centers. We believe that healthcare should be easy and accessible to everyone.

security.title: Complete Security
security.description: Your data is protected and encrypted with the latest technologies

speed.title: Fast Booking
speed.description: Book your appointment in less than a minute

verified.title: Verified Doctors
verified.description: All doctors are reviewed and verified

easy_use.title: Easy to Use
easy_use.description: Simple and easy interface for everyone

how_to_use.title: How to Use
how_to_use.subtitle: Simple steps to book your appointment with a doctor

step1.title: Choose Doctor
step1.description: Search for the right doctor by specialty and location

step2.title: Select Appointment
step2.description: Choose the date and time that suits you

step4.title: Receive Confirmation
step4.description: You will receive a confirmation message

booking.title: Booking Instructions
booking.subtitle: Important tips before booking your appointment

data_accuracy.title: Ensure Data Accuracy
data_accuracy.description: Enter your personal information accurately to avoid any problems

temporary.title: Temporary Booking
temporary.description: Booking is temporary until confirmed by the doctor within 24 hours

communication.title: Contact Doctor
communication.description: You can communicate directly with the doctor through the platform

cancellation.title: Cancellation Option
cancellation.description: You can cancel the appointment 24 hours before the appointment

doctor_services.title: Doctor Services
doctor_services.subtitle: Comprehensive platform for clinic and patient management

dashboard.title: Comprehensive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage all appointments and patients from one place with an easy-to-use interface

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: View and manage appointments in calendar format with filtering and search capabilities

analytics.title: Analytics & Statistics
analytics.description: Detailed statistics about appointments, patients, and overall clinic performance

profile.title: Profile Management
profile.description: Update clinic information, specialty, and personal photos

special_appointments.title: Special Appointments
special_appointments.description: Add and manage special appointments with the ability to add notes

notifications.title: Notification System
notifications.description: Instant notifications for new appointments and important updates

images.title: Image Management
images.description: Upload and update personal photos and clinic images easily

location.title: Location Setting
location.description: Add clinic location on the map to facilitate patient access

medicine_reminder.title: Medicine Reminder
medicine_reminder.description: System to remind patients about medicines and their intake times

health_centers.title: Health Centers Management
health_centers.description: Connect clinics with health centers and manage relationships
